item.title: MIUI V13.0.9.0.SLACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12S Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12S Ultra China

Codename: thor

Version: V13.0.9.0.SLACNXM | 12.0

Size: 7.6 GB

MD5: b4ec9c708d6f53c320b4d532200530e9

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to August 2022. Increased system security.
[Mi Smart Hub]
New: Playback controls for wireless speakers
New:  An improved update process for interconnected devices
New: Access the apps from your tablet from Recents on your phone
New: Clipboard prompts will show up on your phone for phone numbers and URLs copied on other connected devices
New tablet functionality is available for Xiaomi Pad 5 Pro 12.4 out of the box. Xiaomi Pad 5 should be updated to the Beta version released on August 11 or wait for the upcoming stable release in order to access new features.

Download: Here
